pkgmetadata.longdescription: dephell_changelogs==================Installation------------.. code-block:: bash python3 -m pip install --user dephell_changelogsUsage-----Get changelog url:.. code-block:: python from dephell_changelogs import get_changelog_url url = get_changelog_url('dephell') url = get_changelog_url('https://dephell.readthedocs.io/') url = get_changelog_url('https://github.com/dephell/dephell/')Parse changelog:.. code-block:: python from dephell_changelogs import parse_changelog parsed = parse_changelog(url) parsed['0.8.0'] # 'New commands:\n\n+ [dephell package bug]...'
